methods.description: Gets a similarity key for matching purposes for parsed full name data

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

parameters.name: firstname
parameters.description: First name from which to generate similarity key

parameters.name: lastname
parameters.description: Last name from which to generate similarity key

apiDescription: This API provides a similarity key used to match with other similar full name data when data fields are parsed into first name and last name components, including for purposes of deduplication, fuzzy matching, or merging of datasets. A much higher match rate will be achieved by matching on the similarity key rather than the data itself. This API is for full name data where first and last name are in separate fields. Use the Full Name Similarity Key API for first and last name data that are in the same field.
apiTitle: Interzoid Get Full Name Parsed Match Similarity Key API
